quote: Amy [Winehouse] changed pop music forever, I remember knowing there was hope, and feeling not alone because of her. She lived jazz, she lived the blues.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: For the moon never beams without bringing me dreams Of the beautiful Annabel Lee; And the stars never rise but I feel the bright eyes Of the beautiful Annabel Lee; And so, all the night-tide, I lie down by the side Of my darling- my darling- my life and my bride, In the sepulchre there by the sea, In her tomb by the sounding sea.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: For the moon never beams without bringing me dreamsOf the beautiful Annabel Lee;And the stars never rise but i feel the bright eyesOf the beautiful Annabel Lee.
author: Edgar Allan Poe,  Annabel Lee

quote: Clairol: Does she or doesn't she... ...take it up the ass.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Bella. You were always my soul.
author: Lora Leigh,  Wild Card

quote: I have no name,"she purred. "I'm whoever the keepers of my fate tell me to be.
author: Sarah J. Maas,  The Assassin and the Underworld

quote: Clairol 2: Hair color so natural only her hairdresser knows for sure... ...but he's gay and already Tweeted it to 300 people.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: French name, English accent, American school. Anna confused.
author: Stephanie Perkins,  Anna and the French Kiss

quote: When darkness falls and eyes stay shutA chain of voices opens up.Let wax not wane give breath to death.p.s. Shhh"-Yvonne Woon(Dead Beautiful)
author: Yvonne Woon

quote: I bleed ink for her, because her name is written on my heart. She’s the author of all the love I have to give.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Sublime Beauty When I shut my eyes, I can move mountains.When I open them, mountains can move me.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: The WandererWhat is she like?I was told—she is amelancholy soul.She is likethe sun to the night;a momentary gold.A star when dimmedby dawning light;the flicker ofa candle blown.A lonely kitelost in flight—someone oncehad flown.
author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure

quote: Stars,"she whispered. "I can see the stars again, my lady."A tear trickled down Artemis's cheek. "Yes, my brave one. They are beautiful tonight."Stars,"Zoe repeated. Her eyes fixed on the night sky. And she did not move again.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Titan's Curse

quote: Flutter like a hummingbird, Dive like an eagle, Ain't no bird that's my equal. - Twilight
author: Kathryn Lasky,  The Capture

quote: .."I don't even know her yet..but if she could see me right now, I'd want her to know that I love her.."~E.L.~
author: Eric Ludy,  When Dreams Come True: A Love Story Only God Could Write

quote: I love you, Missy girl. Even if I can't be with you, know that I'm here. So, that's it. More than the stars, Taylor. More than the stars.
author: Chelsea M. Cameron,  My Favorite Mistake

quote: When you lost sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart (Allen Walker, D-gray Man)
author: Katsura Hoshino

quote: I've seen you, beauty, and you belong to me now, whoever you are waiting for and if I never see you again, I thought. You belong to me and all Paris belongs to me and I belong to this notebook and this pencil.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Somewhere fate laughs in her far-off country, because now I am the human and it is Grace I will lose again and again, immer wieder, always the same, every winter, losing more of her each year, unless I find a cure.
author: Maggie Stiefvater,  Linger

quote: I want to write a song about the only girl I’ve ever loved. And the chorus will say something like, “I really want to see you tonight, so I hope you leave your blinds open.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.

quote: Before I fellin love with words,with setting skies and singing birds—it was you I fellin love with first.
author: Lang Leav,  Love & Misadventure

quote: But Amy,"Elder says. "Space suits!
author: Beth Revis,  A Million Suns

quote: You’re my best friend,You’re my love,You’re my life.I can’t wait tomake youmy wife!Love, Ryan
author: Tina Reber,  Love Unrehearsed

quote: Tyson- "Cash? Like...green paper?"Percy- "Yeah."Tyson- "Like the kind in duffel bags?"Percy-"Yeah, but we lost those bags days a-g-g--.""Tyson! How did you--"Tyson- "Thought it was a feed bag for Rainbow. Found it floating in sea, but only paper inside. Sorry.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Love. The reason I dislike that word is that it means too much for me, far more than you can understand."- Anna Karenina {Anna Karenina}
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham)
author: Ally Condie,  Matched

quote: The way you walk, way you talk, way you say my name; it's beautiful, wonderful, don't you ever change.
author: Taylor Swift,  Taylor Swift

quote: I thought of you and how you love this beauty,And walking up the long beach all aloneI heard the waves breaking in measured thunderAs you and I once heard their monotone.Around me were the echoing dunes, beyond meThe cold and sparkling silver of the sea --We two will pass through death and ages lengthenBefore you hear that sound again with me.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: Oh, I wouldn't mind, Hazel Grace. It would be a privilege to have my heart broken by you.
author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars

quote: Pamela Anderson Haiku Ben Stillerbeds Pamela Anderson.My alarm clock rings
author: Beryl Dov

quote: I don't get it,' Caroline said, bemused. 'She's the only one with wings. Why is that?'There were so many questions in life. You couldn't ever have all the answers. But I knew this one.It's so she can fly,' I said. Then I started to run.
author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever

quote: You can curse the moonCurse the day your’re bornBut the pilot of your plane is youWe’re all in this world, by a greater plan Look up, lift your wings, Because you canThe Light Said (The First Song album)
author: Phyllis Wheaton

quote: She was famous, and she was insane.Her voice soared out over the audience, holding them spellbound and enraptured, delivering their hopes and fears tangled in chords and rhythm. They called her an angel, her voice a gift.She was famous, and she was a liar.
author: Dianne Sylvan,  Queen of Shadows

quote: She walks in beauty, like the nightOf cloudless climes and starry skies;And all that's best of dark and brightMeet in her aspect and her eyes...
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: How long have you been with Raphael?”“You ask a lot of questions for a dead woman.”“What can I say? I prefer to die well-informed.”-Venom and Elena
author: Nalini Singh,  Angels' Blood

quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
author: Andre Breton

quote: I didn't know you had a girlfriend, Griggs."Anson Choi feigns surprise. "What's her name?""I didn't actually catch her name,"Griggs continues."Lily,"Raffaela says over her shoulder and this time I give her a sideways look."Great to know that I'm in love with a girl with a cool name.""It's Taylor's middle name,"Raffaela calls back again.
author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road

quote: She was a beautiful dreamer. The kind of girl, who kept her head in the clouds, loved above the stars and left regret beneath the earth she walked on.
author: Robert M. Drake

quote: The way you're singing in your sleepThe way you look before you leapThe strange illusions that you keepYou don't knowBut I'm noticingThe way your touch turns into arcsThe way you slide into the darkThe beating of my open heartYou don't knowBut I'm noticing
author: David Levithan,  Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist

quote: I didn’t mean to fall in love with you, but I did.- Chelsea
author: Rachel Gibson,  Nothing But Trouble

quote: This is Leo. I'm the... What's my title? Am I like, admiral, or captain, or...""Repair boy.""Very funny, Piper.
author: Rick Riordan,  The Son of Neptune

quote: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one; Helen Keller is the other.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Max, you're the last of the hybrids who still has...a soul.' ... 'She doesn't have soul,' Gazzy scoffed. 'Have you ever seen her dance?
author: James Patterson,  Saving the World and Other Extreme Sports

quote: Her words are her wings. She's flying.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Zoey~ 'Listen to me, whinning about money and a scarf. Ah, hell! I'm starting to sound like Aphrodite.'Stark~ 'If you turn into Aprodite I'm going to stab myself.'Zoey~ 'If I turn into Aprodite, stab me first.'Stark~ 'Deal.'Zoey~ 'Deal.
author: P.C. Cast,  Awakened

quote: AnatasiaYou Are My More My Love, My LifeChristian
author: E.L. James,  Fifty Shades Freed

quote: Come to think of it, she did not speak a word. Yet I could have sworn she had the most beautiful voice.
author: Julie Klassen,  The Silent Governess

quote: A starry night moon looks at you with admiration because in her eyes you are a star.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Star-crossed lovers desperate to get home together. Two hearts beating as one. Romance.
author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games

quote: I love with love, so that we all may love."~ Amunhotep El Bey
author: Amunhotep El Bey,  The Quotations Book of life and Death
